title: Riddler One
author: Riddler One
content: The current blockchain market is full of all kinds of scammers and rubbish, they are all just plagiarism and imitation without really promoting the progress of the blockchain or expressing their own ideas, I will make something different, not necessarily At the technical level, but at the ideological level, the blockchain needs a lot of thinking.The technical level of Bitcoin is not very high in retrospect. Its narrative and core are the essence of its successBTW. I can’t remember my previous account. I haven’t logged in for many years. I just sigh to see if there are any acquaintances. My previous name was Wynig with numbers i think. Sorry, I really don’t remember clearly, but now i'm the Riddler

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: Riddler One on August 02, 2023, 12:27:09 AMBTW. I can’t remember my previous account. I haven’t logged in for many years. I just sigh to see if there are any acquaintances. My previous name was Wynig with numbers i think.This is the wrong board to recover your account, but there are only 2 usernames with "Wynig" in it:2176354. Matthewynigo1523!2965859. WynIGEqB4C0Both don't have any posts, the latter got Nuked for spamming.

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: Quote from: Riddler One on August 02, 2023, 12:27:09 AMThe current blockchain market is full of all kinds of scammers and rubbish, they are all just plagiarism and imitation without really promoting the progress of the blockchain or expressing their own ideas, I will make something different, not necessarily At the technical level, but at the ideological level, the blockchain needs a lot of thinking.The technical level of Bitcoin is not very high in retrospect. Its narrative and core are the essence of its successBTW. I can’t remember my previous account. I haven’t logged in for many years. I just sigh to see if there are any acquaintances. My previous name was Wynig with numbers i think. Sorry, I really don’t remember clearly, but now i'm the Riddler    I don't think you are referring to the BTC blockchain solely. Well, I have seen many blockchains grow faster and solve real problems. But every aspect of life has good and bad actors and the blockchain market also has both. So, those bad actors will always try to copycat some platform like fake exchanges, fake blockchain (which is almost difficult), etc. to lure newbies into scams. So, idk how you are going to solve this thing at an ideological level while it needs a solution at a technical level.

comments.author: Ndabagi01
comments.body: Quote from: Riddler One on August 02, 2023, 12:27:09 AMThe current blockchain market is full of all kinds of scammers and rubbish, they are all just plagiarism and imitation without really promoting the progress of the blockchain or expressing their own ideas, I will make something different, not necessarily At the technical level, but at the ideological level, the blockchain needs a lot of thinking.The technical level of Bitcoin is not very high in retrospect. Its narrative and core are the essence of its successI can't wait to see what ideological level you intend to employ to modify the narrative and of the blockchain network, as well as what you perceive in them as plagiarised with the idea of them not promoting their own ideas. It is fine to see things differently and try to implement your own ideas, but the blockchain network requires something technically inclined for you to change the prevailing narrative you deem unsatisfactory.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Riddler One on August 02, 2023, 12:27:09 AMThe current blockchain market is full of all kinds of scammers and rubbish, they are all just plagiarism and imitation without really promoting the progress of the blockchain or expressing their own ideas, I will make something different, not necessarily At the technical level, but at the ideological level, the blockchain needs a lot of thinking.The technical level of Bitcoin is not very high in retrospect. Its narrative and core are the essence of its successBTW. I can’t remember my previous account. I haven’t logged in for many years. I just sigh to see if there are any acquaintances. My previous name was Wynig with numbers i think. Sorry, I really don’t remember clearly, but now i'm the Riddler    Check all your email if it has an email coming from Bitcointalk if you receive a message coming from other members or if you got warnings it will show up, I don't know what this new idea and something different, we welcome it as long as it has a use case, the whole community will benefit and you're not going to ask people money for your idea, so many people come here promoting their revolutionary concept of Cryptocurrency then do crowdfunding so they can build the platform for that idea after the crowdfunding they never come back.

comments.author: Riddler One
comments.body: I create something, it's not a crowdfunding, it's a Social experimentFind some information on the websitehttps://riddle.one/
